metadata.name: 2HOT4WEB3 1
metadata.description:
Oh dear, it's with heavy heart and charred emotions that we bid farewell to Crypto Punk 385. They may have been burnt on the blockchain, but their memory will forever be etched in our hearts and minds, much like the scorch marks left on a well-done steak.

Let us take a moment to reflect on the irony of a digital asset being burned, as if it were a sacrifice to the blockchain gods. Perhaps 385 was just too hot to handle, or maybe they were simply too cool for school.

Whatever the case may be, let us remember them as a fiery trailblazer in the world of NFTs, a true hot property in a sea of lukewarm imitators. Rest in peace, Crypto Punk 385, may your pixels forever be ablaze in the ether.
